trans-unit.source: Creates a container within which other controls can share horizontal or vertical space.
trans-unit.target: 建立容器，其他控制項可以在其中共用水平或垂直間距。

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> to hold one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> or user-defined controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>來保存一或多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>或使用者定義的控制項。

trans-unit.source: You might find that one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> controls meet the needs of your application better than a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> if you do not need the four panels and the central <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 您可能會發現一個或多個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>控制項符合優於應用程式的需求<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>如果您不需要四個面板和中央<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>。

trans-unit.source: You can use only one panel if you so choose, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> works well in Multiple Document Interface (MDI) scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 如果您選擇這樣做，可以使用只有一個面板和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>都適用於多個文件介面 (MDI) 案例。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> is expandable and collapsible.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>可展開及摺疊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> controls with a multiple document interface (MDI).
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>多重文件介面 (MDI) 的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> automatically adjusts its size when the form is resized.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出當調整表單的大小時，<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> 是否會自動調整其大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> automatically resizes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> 會自動調整大小則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.AutoSize" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.AutoSize" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.AutoSizeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.AutoSizeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> named `ToolStripPanel1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>名為`ToolStripPanel1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.AutoSizeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.AutoSizeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Begins the initialization of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 開始初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 擷取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> 控制項的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> 控制項的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the space, in pixels, that is specified by default between controls.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項之間的預設指定間距 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> that represents the default space between controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />，表示控制項之間的預設間距。

trans-unit.source: Gets the internal spacing, in pixels, of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項內容的內部間距 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> that represents the internal spacing of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />，表示控制項內容的內部間距。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>參考。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which control borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a control is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定停駐在其父控制項的控制項框線，並決定控制項隨其父代重新調整大小的方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is None.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 None。

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 結束初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.Join%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.Join%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> value representing the x- and y-client coordinates, in pixels, of the new location for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 值，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的新位置之 x 和 y 工作區座標 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 加入至指定之位置上的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> to which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is added.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，表示要將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> 加入其中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> in the specified row.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 加入至指定之資料列中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="row" /> parameter is less than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="row" /> 參數小於零 (0)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal client coordinate, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 水平的工作區座標 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: The vertical client coordinate, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 垂直的工作區座標 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 加入至位於指定之座標的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a cached instance of the control's layout engine.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項之配置引擎的快取執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> for the control's contents.
trans-unit.target: 控制項內容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> can be moved or resized.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否可以將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> 移動或調整其大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> can be moved or resized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> 移動或調整其大小，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ControlAdded" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ControlAdded" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlAdded%2A> method is called when a child control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlAdded%2A>子控制項加入時，呼叫方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlAdded%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlAdded%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ControlRemoved" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ControlRemoved" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlRemoved%2A> is called when a child control is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlRemoved%2A>從移除子控制項時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlRemoved%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlRemoved%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DockChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DockChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnDockChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnDockChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnDockChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnDockChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnDockChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnDockChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnLayout%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnLayout%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: 繪製控制項的背景。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnParentChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnParentChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.RendererChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.RendererChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnRendererChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnRendererChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnRendererChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnRendererChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnRendererChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnRendererChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnRightToLeftChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnRightToLeftChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnRightToLeftChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnRightToLeftChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnRightToLeftChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnRightToLeftChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the horizontal or vertical orientation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> 的水平或垂直方向。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> used as a reference to find the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />，當做尋找 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> 的參考使用。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> given a point within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> client area.
trans-unit.target: 在有提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> 工作區 (Client Area) 內的某個位置點時，擷取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> that contains the <paramref name="raftingContainerPoint" />, or <see langword="null" /> if no such <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> exists.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />，包含 <paramref name="raftingContainerPoint" />；如果沒有這種 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> 存在，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> used to customize the appearance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" />，用來自訂 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> 的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> that handles painting.
trans-unit.target: 處理繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.Renderer" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.Renderer" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.RendererChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.RendererChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> named `ToolStripPanel1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>名為`ToolStripPanel1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.RendererChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.RendererChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the painting styles to be applied to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定套用至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> 的繪製樣式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the spacing, in pixels, between the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />s and the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> 之間的間距 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> value representing the spacing, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> 值，表示以像素為單位的間距。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />s in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.ToolStripPanelRowCollection" /> representing the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />s in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.ToolStripPanelRowCollection" />，表示此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the tab index.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，表示定位點索引。
